description: '''Slavko Avsenik''' (November 26, 1929 â€“ July 2, 2015) was a [[Slovenia|Slovene]] composer and musician. Beginning in 1953 with the formation of the [[Avsenik Brothers Ensemble]], Avsenik produced more than 1,000 songs and garnered success both in [[Slovenia]] and in other parts of Europe and America, and is viewed as a Slovenian cultural icon.
